results.description: Paris St-Germain lose Kylian Mbappe and Edinson Cavani to injury as the French champions comfortably beat Toulouse.
results.shortTitle: Mbappe & Cavani injured in PSG victory
results.title: Paris St-Germain 4-0 Toulouse: Kylian Mbappe and Edinson Cavani injured in comfortable win

results.description: Barcelona beat Real Betis in La Liga & PSG thrash Toulouse in Ligue 1.
results.shortTitle: Barcelona thrash Betis, PSG hammer Toulouse
results.title: European football: Barcelona v Real Betis & PSG v Toulouse live

results.description: Nottingham Forest sign defender Chema from Levante for an undisclosed fee and midfielder John Bostock from Toulouse on loan.
results.shortTitle: Forest sign defender Chema and midfielder Bostock
results.title: Nottingham Forest sign Levante's Chema & John Bostock from Toulouse

results.description: West Ham face Athletic Bilbao, Crystal Palace host Hertha Berlin & Norwich City play Toulouse - Listen to BBC local radio commentary.
results.shortTitle: Listen: West Ham, Crystal Palace & Norwich in pre-season action
results.title: Listen to West Ham v Athletic Bilbao, Crystal Palace v Hertha Berlin & Norwich City v Toulouse in pre-season friendlies

results.description: Celtic complete the signing of French centre-back Christopher Jullien from Toulouse on a four-year contract.
results.title: Christopher Jullien: Defender joins Celtic from Toulouse

results.description: Kylian Mbappe scores his 31st goal of the season as Ligue 1 leaders Paris St-Germain edge to victory at Toulouse.
results.shortTitle: Mbappe nets winner for leaders PSG
results.title: Toulouse 0-1 PSG: Kylian Mbappe nets winner for Ligue 1 leaders

results.description: Cesc Fabregas scores his first goal for Monaco as the Ligue 1 strugglers record their first win since Thierry Henry's sacking.
results.shortTitle: Fabregas scores first Monaco goal in win over Toulouse
results.title: Monaco 2-1 Toulouse: Fabregas scores first Monaco goal

thumbnail.altText: Cesc Fabregas applauds the Monaco fans after scoring his first goal for the club against Toulouse in Ligue 1

results.description: Barcelona have agreed a deal with Jean-Clair Todibo to sign the defender on a free transfer when his contract with Toulouse runs out on 30 June.
results.title: Barcelona: Jean-Clair Todibo of Toulouse to join Catalan club

results.description: PSG warm up for their game against Liverpool by beating Toulouse to extend their record-breaking start to the Ligue 1 season.
results.title: PSG 1-0 Toulouse: Champions win 14th consecutive Ligue 1 game

results.description: Dimitri Payet is the beneficiary as VAR is used for the first time in French football in Marseille's opening-day win over Toulouse.
results.shortTitle: Payet scores first Ligue 1 VAR penalty
results.title: Dimitri Payet: Marseille midfielder scores first VAR penalty in Ligue 1

results.description: Bournemouth winger Max Gradel joins French club Toulouse for an undisclosed fee after two spells on the south coast.
results.title: Max Gradel: Bournemouth winger joins French club Toulouse

results.description: West Ham sign France Under-21 defender Issa Diop for a club record fee of 22m from Toulouse.
results.shortTitle: West Ham sign Diop for club record 22m
results.title: Issa Diop: West Ham sign Toulouse defender for club record 22m

results.description: Paris St-Germain are 12 points clear at the top of Ligue 1 after Neymar's goal beat Toulouse.
results.title: Toulouse 0-1 Paris St-Germain

results.description: Stoke City send forward Bojan Krkic to Alaves and Giannelli Imbula to Toulouse, both on a season's loan.
results.shortTitle: Bojan and Imbula leave Stoke on loan
results.title: Bojan Krkic and Giannelli Imbula leave Stoke on loan deals

results.description: Neymar scores twice on his home debut as Paris St-Germain net four of their six goals with only 10 men to beat Toulouse.
results.title: Paris St-Germain 6-2 Toulouse

results.description: Bournemouth winger Max Gradel joins French Ligue 1 side Toulouse on loan until the end of the season.
results.shortTitle: Winger Gradel joins Toulouse on loan
results.title: Max Gradel: Bournemouth winger joins French club Toulouse on loan

results.description: Follow live text coverage as Real Madrid begin their La Liga campaign and Neymar scores on his home debut for PSG.
results.title: Bale scores in Real Madrid opener

results.description: Kylian Mbappe - reportedly a 160m target for Real Madrid - suffers an injury as French champions Monaco fight back to beat Toulouse.
results.shortTitle: Mbappe suffers injury in Monaco win
results.title: Kylian Mbappe: Monaco forward suffers injury in win over Toulouse

results.description: Kylian Mbappe scores his 14th Ligue 1 goal of the season as Monaco come from behind to beat Toulouse and go three points clear at the top.
results.title: Monaco 3-1 Toulouse

thumbnail.altText: Monaco's players celebrate a goal against Toulouse

results.description: French top-flight club Toulouse sack two players for their alleged part in a pellet gun attack on a passer-by from a car.
results.shortTitle: Players sacked over pellet gun attack
results.title: Toulouse sack Odsonne Edouard & Mathieu Cafaro over alleged pellet gun attack
